Vampire.BloodlineDef.label: Toreador
Vampire.BloodlineDef.description: Clan Toreador are the artists of the night, valuing beauty over all. They are the most humane of vampires.

Vampire.BloodlineDef.label: Brujah
Vampire.BloodlineDef.description: Clan Brujah are the philosophers whose downfall led to an eternity of rage and rebellion. Their emotional nature keeps their beast closer than ever.
